title: Class 40 panoramic view
body:
![](https://31.media.tumblr.com/6a4f8e4a0cbe38c8c476406209b43cf3/tumblr_inline_nez80pePnJ1qcydz0.png)

Want to take a 360ยบ look around a Class 40 boat? Try [these panoramic shots of Juliette Petres's CONCISE](http://www.go-image.com/visitejuliette/juliette.html).
